title: Lynas Rare Earths Says CEO Amanda Lacaze to Step Down in June
description: Lynas Rare Earths Ltd. Chief Executive Officer Amanda Lacaze will step down after 12 years at the helm of one of the top performers on Australia’s benchmark stock index over the past year.
content: Lynas Rare Earths Ltd. Chief Executive Officer Amanda Lacaze will step down after 12 years at the helm of one of the top performers on Australia’s benchmark stock index over the past year.
